resources.string:
Next feature release:
 · New: Allow caches to be stored on more than one list
 · New: Different http libraries for more efficient network communication
 · New: Update of Locus API for improved interworking
 · New: New account administration layout
 · New: Removed option to show only short description of a cache
 · Fix: Twitter NUMBER template showing wrong find count
 · Fix: Terain filter was going up to T7.5
